query.statement: SELECT custom.cus_no, c.code_name as custom.user_tc, custom.rbno, custom.cnm, custom.psno, custom.addr, custom.dong_blw_addr, custom.last_chng_usid, custom.last_chng_dt, rownum as no FROM custom, code c where c.code_type='USER_TC' and c.code = custom.user_tc
SELECT custom.cus_no, custom.user_tc, custom.rbno, custom.cnm, custom.psno, custom.addr, custom.dong_blw_addr, custom.last_chng_usid, custom.last_chng_dt FROM custom WHERE cus_no = :vo.cusNo
